thread.title: Mark Price
thread.title_full: Players Choice Videogames reviewed by Mark Price

author: Mark Price
title: Mark Price
text: I was looking everywhere for THPS3 for Xbox original and couldn't find it. A simple google search sent me here and it was only a few dollars. Fast shipping and the disc was in great shape! If your playing on a Xbox 360 you may have to change your video settings to 480p. Will be ordering more games soon!
